archetypes.title: Ruler
archetypes.explanation: IBM has long been a leading authority in the tech industry.

archetypes.title: Creator
archetypes.explanation: IBM has a history of innovation and creating new technology.

archetypes.title: Sage
archetypes.explanation: IBM's role as a source of wisdom and knowledge in the field of technology is well-known.

archetypes.title: Magician
archetypes.explanation: IBM's ability to create innovative solutions gives it a 'Magician' quality.

archetypes.title: Hero
archetypes.explanation: As a resilient player in the tech industry, IBM embodies some elements of the 'Hero' archetype.
